name: Sugar Cookies
ingredients: 2 3/4 cups all-purpose flour,1 teaspoon baking soda,1/2 teaspoon baking powder,1 cup butter,1 1/2 cups white sugar,1 egg,1 teaspoon vanilla extract,
steps: In a small bowl, stir flour, baking soda, and baking powder
Cream butter and sugar together. Beat in eggs and vanilla.
Place teaspoonfuls of dough into ball and place onto ungreased cookie sheets
Bake 8 to 10 minutes in an oven and then let cool.
